value: AND is a logic operator which operates on expression and tells us (gives output as True) when both the expressions are True.
For example: I like Mango AND My favorite color is pink
OR is also a Logic Operator which operates on expression and tells us (gives output as True) when any one of the expressions is True.
For example: I have one sibling OR I have 4 family members
NOT is also a Logic Operator which operates on expression and tells us (gives output as) True when the expression is incorrect.
For example: NOT My roll number is 15
